plot: A live performance musical adventure that brings to life the drama, dance, and emotion of Benise's Flamenco style guitar style.
title: Benise: The Spanish Guitar
plot_es: A live performance musical adventure that brings to life the drama, dance, and emotion of Benise's Flamenco style guitar style.
plot_en: A live performance musical adventure that brings to life the drama, dance, and emotion of Benise's Flamenco style guitar style.
